layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutSVGHiddenContainer {defs} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutSVGResourceLinearGradient {linearGradient} [id="gradient"] [gradientUnits=objectBoundingBox] [stops=( #FF0000@0.00 #0000FF@1.00 )] [start=(0,0)] [end=(1,0)]
